item.title: 消息称折叠屏版 iPad 或 2029 年才亮相
item.guid: 消息称折叠屏版-iPad-或-2029-年才亮相
item.description:
Image from 9to5Mac

Early this morning, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman published an article stating that Apple is currently attempting to redesign the iPad by adding a giant foldable screen, but this plan has encountered multiple issues, leading to a later release date for the product than originally intended. 今天凌晨，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 发文称，苹果目前正在试图通过新增巨型可折叠屏来重新设计 iPad，但这一计划遇到了多重问题，导致相关产品发布时间将会比原定目标更晚。

Gurman stated that Apple has been developing a foldable screen iPad for several years, with an estimated price of $3000 (approximately RMB 21367), and the latest plan is to release it in 2028. Gurman 称， 苹果目前已研发折叠屏版 iPad 数年，定价预计在 3000 美元（约合人民币 21367 元），目前最新计划是于 2028 年发布。

However, according to informed sources, due to engineering challenges related to weight, functionality, display technology, and other factors, the debut of the foldable screen iPad has currently been postponed to 2029 or even later. 但据知情人士透露， 由于重量、功能、显示技术等相关工程挑战影响，折叠屏 iPad 的首次亮相目前已被推迟至 2029 年甚至更晚。

The report states that the screen portion of the foldable iPad will be co-developed with Samsung, measuring approximately 18 inches, and the crease optimization will use the same technology as the rumored foldable iPhone. In terms of size, the foldable iPad, when folded, will be about the size of a 13-inch laptop and will feature an aluminum alloy casing. 报道称，折叠屏 iPad 的屏幕部分将与三星合作开发，约为 18 英寸，折痕优化将与传闻中的折叠屏 iPhone 共用同样的技术。尺寸方面，折叠屏 iPad 折叠后约为一台 13 英寸的笔记本电脑的大小，并且采用铝合金外壳。

At the same time, the report also pointed out that engineers are not satisfied with the weight of the foldable iPad: the product will weigh 3.5 pounds (approximately 1.59 kilograms), which is close to or even exceeds the weight of a 14-inch MacBook Pro (the M5 MacBook Pro 14 weighs 1.55 kilograms). 同时，报道还指出，工程师对折叠屏 iPad 的重量不够满意：该产品重量将达到 3.5 磅（约 1.59 千克），而这一表现接近甚至超过一台 14 英寸的 MacBook Pro 的重量（M5 MacBook Pro 14 重量为 1.55 千克）。

Additionally, Apple's new iPad Pro officially went on sale today. The new device is equipped with the latest M5 chip, bringing dual improvements in performance and AI capabilities. 另外，苹果全新 iPad Pro 今日正式开售，新机搭载最新的 M5 芯片，带来性能与 AI 能力双提升。

The new iPad Pro's screen can reach a peak brightness of 1600 nits, a minimum brightness as low as 1 nit, and supports an external display refresh rate of up to 120Hz. 新 iPad Pro 屏幕峰值亮度可达 1600 尼特，最低亮度低至 1 尼特，并支持最高 120Hz 外接显示器刷新率。

In terms of network and connectivity, the new device is equipped with Apple's self-developed N1 wireless chip for the first time, supporting Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 6 for more stable peripheral connections. The cellular network version uses the C1X baseband, with data transfer speeds increased by approximately 50% compared to the previous generation, and supports eSIM. 网络与连接方面，新机首次搭载苹果自研 N1 无线芯片，支持 Wi-Fi 7 与蓝牙 6，外设连接更稳定；蜂窝网络版本则采用 C1X 基带，数据传输速度较前代提升约 50%，支持 eSIM。

It is worth noting that the iPad eSIM setup process is simpler than iPhone Air; you can directly download the carrier app and follow the instructions, without needing to visit a physical store. 值得注意的是，iPad eSIM 设置流程相比 iPhone Air 更加简便，直接下载运营商应用根据指引即可，无需前往营业厅。

In terms of storage and memory configuration, the entry-level model's RAM has been upgraded from the previous generation's 8GB to 12GB (1TB and above versions have 16GB), and SSD read/write speeds have also improved. 存储与内存配置方面，入门款起步从上代的 8G RAM 升级为 12GB（1TB 及以上版本为 16GB），SSD 读写速度也有所提升。

item.title: 制糖工厂首创 OTW 云端升级服务，让「出厂定型」的充电头实现持续更新进化
item.guid: 制糖工厂首创-OTW-云端升级服务，让「出厂定型」的充电头实现持续更新进化
item.description:
On October 21st, Sugarcane Factory officially launched the internal beta of its OTW (Over The Wire & Wireless) custom charging solution service. 10 月 21 日，制糖工厂正式开启 OTW（Over The Wire & Wireless）自定义充电方案服务内测。

Unlike common OTA (Over The Air, wireless upgrades), OTW allows even non-networked chargers to receive continuous updates through a "wired + wireless" relay. 不同于常见的 OTA（Over The Air，无线升级），OTW 让即便不会联网的充电器，也能通过「有线 + 无线」的接力持续更新。

At the same time, OTW is also a long-term online cloud service, with a built-in "Own The Wish" mode, providing customized charging solutions for different devices. 同时，OTW 还是一项长期在线的云端服务，内置 Own The Wish 模式，为不同设备提供定制化的充电方案。

Through OTW, users can push configuration updates to charging heads with the assistance of AI Xiaodianpin, and customize exclusive charging solutions according to their device needs. This innovation transforms what were once standardized, generic components into personalized, self-evolving devices. 通过 OTW，用户可在 AI 小电拼的协助下，为充电头推送配置更新，并根据自身设备需求定制专属充电方案。这一创新，让原本千人一面的标准件，变成能够自我成长的个性化设备。

The Hard Candy A Charger (40W) has become the first non-smart AVS charging head that users can self-upgrade. With the help of AI Xiaodianpin's Smart Charging Agent function, users can obtain the latest configuration files via cloud OTA and upgrade the Hard Candy A Charger through a wired connection. 硬糖 A 充（40W）成为首个用户能够自升级的非智能 AVS 充电头，借助 AI 小电拼的智能助理功能（Smart Charging Agent），用户从云端 OTA 获取最新配置文件，并通过有线的方式硬糖 A 充进行升级。

After upgrading, the Hard Candy A Charger will gain continuously optimized protocol support and charging strategies, maintaining long-term compatibility and efficient performance with new devices and standards. 升级后，硬糖 A 充将获得持续优化的协议支持与充电策略，保持与新设备、新标准的长期兼容与高效表现。

OTW also provides on-demand upgrade modes for different models. Currently, users can configure the Hard Candy A Charger with three modes: Huawei mode, Android mode, and native mode. OTW 还为不同机型提供了按需升级模式。目前，用户可为硬糖 A 充配置三种模式：华为模式、安卓模式和原生模式。

Among them, Huawei mode prioritizes the Huawei protocol and cancels the PD protocol, while Android mode defaults to two PPS levels. Subsequently, Sugarcane Factory will gradually introduce other modes to meet users' demands for personalized charging. 其中，华为模式优先握手华为协议，取消 PD 协议，而安卓模式默认两档 PPS。后续，制糖工厂将陆续推出其他模式，满足用户对个性化充电的需求。

item.title: OpenAI 首个 AI 浏览器发布
item.guid: OpenAI-首个-AI-浏览器发布
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI officially released its first browser, ChatGPT Atlas, which has ChatGPT directly built-in and also comes with memory and Agent capabilities. 今天凌晨，OpenAI 正式发布了首个浏览器 ChatGPT Atlas，其直接内置了 ChatGPT，还自带记忆和 Agent 能力。

🔗 Related Reading: Just now, OpenAI's first AI browser was released! Not like Chrome, but it wants to change the way you browse the internet | Includes hands-on test 🔗 相关阅读： 刚刚，OpenAI首个AI浏览器发布！不像Chrome，但想改变你上网的方式｜附实测

OpenAI stated that Atlas is a browser built around ChatGPT, rather than simply stuffing ChatGPT into it. Its core philosophy is comprehensive integration: OpenAI 表示，Atlas 是围绕 ChatGPT 构建的浏览器，而不是简单地把 ChatGPT 塞进去，其核心理念是全方位整合：

    Call out the sidebar anytime: Click the "Ask ChatGPT" button to open the ChatGPT sidebar on the right side of any page. ChatGPT, with its constant contextual understanding, can read the detailed content of your current page, help you summarize content, explain information, or directly handle tasks within the current window;

    AI assistance feature: When you type content into any open text input box, ChatGPT can provide real-time modification suggestions and smart completions, helping you type more efficiently;

    Agent mode: Allows ChatGPT to autonomously complete multi-step tasks within the browser.

Starting today, macOS users can access it. Free, Plus, Pro, and Go ChatGPT users can download and experience it, while Windows, iOS, and Android versions will be launched soon. 从今天开始，macOS 用户就能用上了，ChatGPT 免费、Plus、Pro 和 Go 版用户都可以下载体验， 而 Windows、iOS、Android 版本即将推出。

However, the Agent mode is currently only available to Plus, Pro, and Business users , and is still in its early stages, potentially making errors when handling complex tasks. Additionally, if you set Atlas as your preferred browser, you can also get a seven-day membership experience with higher usage limits. 不过，Agent 模式目前只对 Plus、Pro 和 Business 用户开放 ，而且仍处于早期阶段，在处理复杂任务时可能会出错。另外，如果设置 Atlas 为首选浏览器，你也可以获得七天的会员体验，享有更高的使用额度。

Download address: chatgpt.com/atlas 下载地址：chatgpt.com/atlas

item.title: 小鹏汽车广州新总部正式启用
item.guid: 小鹏汽车广州新总部正式启用
item.description:
Yesterday, Xpeng Motors announced the official opening of its new headquarters in Guangzhou. The official statement read: "The relocation of the new headquarters marks a new beginning and a new journey." 昨天，小鹏汽车宣布位于广州的新总部正式启用。官方表示：「新总部乔迁，是新起点，是新征程。」

According to reports, the new headquarters has a total area of nearly 400,000 square meters, with an additional 80,000 square meters of parkland. The overall architecture adopts an "X" shape, symbolizing wings spreading upwards. 据介绍，新总部整体面积接近 40 万平方米，另配套 8 万平方米公园，整体建筑采用向上展翅的「X」造型。

The park features 3 technology sales showrooms and a 20,000-square-meter restaurant offering over 400 types of meals, along with diverse services including a "Mom's Canteen," coffee shops, supermarkets, a hospital, barbershop, laundry, fitness, and sports facilities. 园区内设有 3 个科技销售展厅，以及面积达 2 万平方米的餐厅，提供超过 400 种餐食，涵盖妈妈食堂、咖啡店、超市、医院、理发、洗衣、健身与运动等多元服务。

Regarding office space, the new headquarters is approximately three times larger than before, with four levels of underground parking, each designed with double layers, and requiring the automatic parking team to achieve fully automated parking. 办公空间方面，新总部规模较此前扩大约三倍，地下规划四层车位，每层均为双层设计，并要求自动泊车团队实现全自动泊入。

In addition, Xpeng Motors also plans to simultaneously expand its offices in multiple cities across the country, including Beijing, Shanghai, Wuhan, and Shenzhen. 此外，小鹏汽车还计划同步扩建全国多地办公室，包括北京、上海、武汉、深圳等城市。

item.title: 「智能眼镜 + 视网膜植入」临床试验成功，视障患者重获阅读能力
item.guid: 「智能眼镜-+-视网膜植入」临床试验成功，视障患者重获阅读能力
item.description:
According to The Verge, a new study from The New England Journal of Medicine shows that an experimental technology combining smart glasses with a retinal implant has helped some patients severely blinded by age-related macular degeneration (AMD) regain partial central vision. 据 The Verge 报道，来自《新英格兰医学杂志》的最新研究显示，一项结合智能眼镜与视网膜植入物的实验性技术，帮助部分因老年性黄斑变性（AMD）而严重失明的患者恢复了部分中心视力。

The research team implanted a 2×2 mm photovoltaic device, composed of miniature solar panels, beneath the retina in 38 patients over 60 years old. 研究团队在 38 名 60 岁以上患者中植入了一枚 2×2 毫米的光伏装置，该装置由微型太阳能电池板组成，植入于视网膜下方。

The smart glasses worn by patients have a built-in camera that captures external images and transmits them to the implanted device via near-infrared light. The implanted device then sends weak electrical signals to the optic nerve, simulating the function of retinal cells. 患者佩戴的智能眼镜内置摄像头，可捕捉外部画面并通过近红外光传输至植入设备，随后由植入设备向视神经发出微弱电信号，模拟视网膜细胞的功能。

In the one-year clinical trial, 26 out of 32 patients who completed follow-up showed significant improvement in vision compared to baseline levels, accounting for approximately 80%. 在为期一年的临床试验中，32 名坚持完成随访的患者中有 26 名视力较基线水平显著改善，占比约 80%。

Some patients were able to read ordinary books and complete crossword puzzles again. Researchers noted that the current visual effects are still blurry and limited to black and white, but have been described by external experts as "astonishing progress." 部分患者能够重新阅读普通书籍、完成填字游戏。研究人员指出，目前的视觉效果仍然模糊且仅限黑白，但已被外部专家评价为「令人惊叹的进展」。

This technology is being advanced by the brain-computer interface company Science Corporation, whose founder and CEO, Max Hodak, co-founded Neuralink with Elon Musk. Science Corporation acquired relevant technology from the French medical device company Pixium Vision in 2024, allowing this clinical trial to continue. 该技术由脑机接口公司 Science Corporation 推动，其创始人兼 CEO Max Hodak 曾与马斯克共同创立 Neuralink。Science Corporation 于 2024 年收购了法国医疗设备公司 Pixium Vision 的相关技术，使得这项临床试验得以延续。

item.title: iOS 键盘 Bug 导致频繁错字，用户：不是我手滑
item.guid: iOS-键盘-Bug-导致频繁错字，用户：不是我手滑
item.description:
Blogger Michi (@NekoMichiUBC) recently posted on the X platform, reporting an abnormal keyboard input situation in the iOS system: during normal typing, the system randomly inserts incorrect letters, leading to frequent typos for users, and provided a slow-motion video demonstration. 博主 Michi（@NekoMichiUBC）近日在 X 平台上发帖反馈称，iOS 系统中出现了键盘输入异常的情况：在正常输入时，系统会随机插入错误字母，导致用户频繁出现错别字，并配上慢动作视频演示。

The related discussion quickly sparked heated debate, with many netizens saying they had previously thought it was their own "slip of the hand" until they saw the video demonstration and confirmed it was a system bug. 相关讨论迅速引发热议，不少网友表示此前一直以为是自己「手滑」，直到看到视频演示才确认是系统 Bug。

According to user descriptions, the issue has appeared in both iOS 16 and iOS 18. Some even found in slow-motion screen recordings that the keyboard replaces the confirmed key press with an incorrect letter, rather than the content actually entered by the user. 据用户描述，该问题在 iOS 16 与 iOS 18 中均有出现，部分人甚至在慢动作录屏中发现，键盘在按键确认后会替换为错误字母，而非用户实际输入的内容。

Some netizens joked, "I thought my typing skills had deteriorated," while others complained, "Common phrases are frequently corrected incorrectly, affecting communication efficiency." 有网友调侃称「以为自己打字水平退步了」，也有人抱怨「常用词组被频繁改错，影响沟通效率」。

Currently, Apple has not yet responded to this issue, and it is unclear whether the bug will be fixed in subsequent updates. Some users have tried disabling the swipe input feature, but reported that the problem persists. 目前，苹果方面尚未就此问题作出回应，尚不清楚该 Bug 是否会在后续更新中修复。部分用户尝试关闭滑动输入功能，但反馈称问题依旧存在。

item.title: 最新研究：持续喂养低质文本会对 AI 造成不可逆「脑损伤」
item.guid: 最新研究：持续喂养低质文本会对-AI-造成不可逆「脑损伤」
item.description:
Recently, in a paper titled "Large Language Models May Suffer from 'Brain Rot'!" jointly published by multiple universities, the research team pointed out that large language models exhibit a phenomenon similar to human "cognitive degradation" after continuous exposure to low-quality text from online social platforms. 近日，在多所高校联合发布的题为《大语言模型可能会得「脑腐化」！》的论文中，研究团队指出，大型语言模型在持续接触低质量网络社交平台文本后，会出现类似人类「认知退化」的现象。

Researchers conducted continuous pre-training experiments on various models by constructing "junk data" and "control data" from the X platform. 研究人员通过从 X 平台构建「垃圾数据」与「对照数据」，并对多种模型进行持续预训练实验。

The results show that when the model is exposed to a high proportion of "junk data", it experiences a significant decline in reasoning, long-text comprehension, safety, and personality traits. 结果显示，当模型暴露于高比例「垃圾数据」时，其在推理、长文本理解、安全性以及人格倾向等方面均出现显著下降。

Error analysis shows that the model's main problem is "thought skipping": an increasing tendency to truncate or bypass critical reasoning chains required to solve problems. 错误分析显示，模型的主要问题是「思维跳跃」：越来越倾向于截断或跳过解决问题所需的关键推理链条。

Researchers further compared different types of social media posts and found that "engagement" is the strongest toxicity indicator — the more viral content is, the more likely it is to lead to model cognitive degradation. 研究者进一步比较了不同类型的社交媒体帖子，发现「参与度」是最强的毒性指标 —— 越容易病毒式传播的内容，越容易导致模型认知退化。

More worryingly, this decline is persistent. Even if high-quality data is supplemented in subsequent stages for instruction fine-tuning or continued pre-training, the model can only partially recover, and representation drift still exists. 更令人担忧的是，这种衰退具有持久性。即便在后续阶段补充高质量数据进行指令微调或继续预训练，模型也只能部分恢复，仍存在表征漂移。

The research team pointed out that this phenomenon is similar to "brain rot" in humans when exposed to fragmented, low-nutrient information for a long time, emphasizing the critical role of data quality in the continuous training of large models. The research team called on the industry to incorporate "cognitive health checks" into model maintenance processes to avoid long-term capability degradation. 研究团队指出，这一现象与人类在长期接触碎片化、低营养信息时的「脑腐化」类似，强调了数据质量在大模型持续训练中的关键作用。研究团队呼吁业界将「认知健康检查」纳入模型维护流程，以避免能力长期退化。

🔗 Research Project: https://llm-brain-rot.github.io/ 🔗 研究项目： https://llm-brain-rot.github.io/

item.title: Sora「仅限邀请」策略或助推 Meta AI 用户逆势激增
item.guid: Sora「仅限邀请」策略或助推-Meta-AI-用户逆势激增
item.description:
According to "Wall Street Insights," Meta has achieved explosive user data growth with its AI short video platform "Vibes." 据「华尔街见闻」报道，Meta 凭借 AI 短视频平台「Vibes」实现用户数据爆发式增长。

Latest data from market intelligence firm Similarweb shows that since its launch on September 25, Meta AI's daily active users have surged from 775,000 to 2.7 million in just four weeks, with daily new downloads also reaching 300,000, far exceeding the 4,000 times a year ago. 市场情报机构 Similarweb 最新数据显示，自 9 月 25 日上线以来，Meta AI 应用的日活跃用户在短短四周内从 77.5 万跃升至 270 万，日新增下载量也达到 30 万次，远高于一年前的 4000 次。

Analysis indicates that the launch of "Vibes" is highly correlated with the surge in users. The platform allows users to create, discover, and share AI-generated short videos, and supports one-click distribution to Instagram and Facebook, significantly enhancing content dissemination efficiency. 分析指出，「Vibes」的推出与用户激增高度相关。该平台允许用户创作、发现和分享 AI 生成短视频，并支持一键分发至 Instagram 与 Facebook，显著提升了内容的传播效率。

Meanwhile, competitors' performance presents a stark contrast. On October 17, daily active users for ChatGPT, Grok, and Perplexity declined by 3.51%, 7.35%, and 2.29% respectively, while Meta AI saw a counter-trend growth of 15.58% during the same period. 与此同时，竞争对手的表现形成鲜明对比。10 月 17 日当天，ChatGPT、Grok 和 Perplexity 的日活跃用户分别下滑 3.51%、7.35% 和 2.29%，而 Meta AI 同期逆势增长 15.58%。

It is worth noting that OpenAI's video generation model Sora has recently attracted attention due to its "invite-only" strategy, and some users who could not obtain trial qualifications may have turned to alternative products like Meta AI. This external factor may have invisibly boosted Meta's growth momentum. 值得注意的是，OpenAI 的视频生成模型 Sora 近期因「仅限邀请」策略引发关注，部分未能获得试用资格的用户或转向 Meta AI 等替代产品。这一外部因素可能在无形中助推了 Meta 的增长势头。

item.title: 宇树科技发布四足机器人实训平台：面向高校与职校全链条培养
item.guid: 宇树科技发布四足机器人实训平台：面向高校与职校全链条培养
item.description:
According to "Robot Industry Research," Unitree Robotics officially launched a quadruped robot training platform for the education sector yesterday. 据「机器人产研社」报道，昨天，宇树科技正式发布面向教育领域的四足机器人实训平台。

The platform is positioned around "embodied intelligent robot technology — operation and maintenance — application R&D," aiming to provide a full chain of talent training and certification services for universities and vocational colleges. 该平台以「具身智能机器人技术 — 运维 — 应用研发」为核心定位，旨在为高校及职业院校提供全链条的人才培养与认证服务。

It is understood that the training platform takes the Unitree Go2 ecosystem as its technical core, integrating an all-in-one teaching path of "simulation — hands-on practice — competition — training projects." 据了解，该实训平台以 Unitree Go2 生态为技术核心，打通了「仿真 — 上机 — 竞赛 — 实训项目」的一体化教学路径。

The Unitree Go2 quadruped robot, as the core hardware of the platform, is equipped with Unitree Robotics' self-developed 4D LiDAR system, enabling 360° × 90° ultra-wide-angle perception, with a minimum detection distance as low as 0.05 meters. It also possesses complex movement capabilities such as climbing stairs, jumping, and handstands, providing an advanced hardware carrier for practical teaching. 作为平台核心硬件的 Unitree Go2 四足机器人，搭载了宇树科技自研的 4D 激光雷达系统，可实现 360° × 90° 的超广角感知，最小探测距离低至 0.05 米，并具备上下楼梯、跳跃、倒立等复杂运动能力，为实践教学提供了先进的硬件载体。

In terms of configuration, the platform integrates hardware equipment such as standardized training benches and multi-modal sensing kits. It also sets up a ROS2/Unitree SDK development environment and a remote debugging system, and provides accompanying training course packages and motion control algorithm case libraries. The curriculum covers core modules such as basic maintenance, motion control, autonomous navigation, and secondary development, meeting the teaching needs of different stages. 在配置方面，平台整合了标准化实训台、多模态传感套件等硬件设备，同时搭建了 ROS2/Unitree SDK 开发环境及远程调试系统，并配套提供实训课程包与运控算法案例库。课程体系覆盖基础维护、运动控制、自主导航、二次开发等核心模块，可满足不同阶段的教学需求。

The platform emphasizes dual control over cost and safety, adopting a teaching model that combines theory and practice, aiming to enhance students' engineering practical abilities. 该平台强调成本与安全的双重可控，采用理论与实践结合的教学模式，旨在提升学生的工程实践能力。

Currently, Unitree Go2 has been implemented in some colleges and universities. Students have completed training projects such as campus patrols and target recognition through equipment debugging and development, achieving the transformation of algorithmic knowledge into practical applications. 目前，宇树 Go2 已在部分院校落地应用，学生通过设备调试与开发，完成了校园巡检、目标识别等实训项目，实现了算法知识与实际应用的转化。

item.title: 分析称 Anthropic 实际成本被严重低估
item.guid: 分析称-Anthropic-实际成本被严重低估
item.description:
Recently, British tech writer Ed Zitron pointed out in his latest analysis that Anthropic's actual operating costs are significantly higher than its publicly disclosed figures. 近日，英国科技作家 Ed Zitron 在其最新分析中指出，Anthropic 的实际运营成本远高于其对外披露的数据。

According to public information and industry insiders, Anthropic's spending on Amazon Web Services (AWS) alone in 2024 reached $1.359 billion, while its revenue for the same period was only about $400 million to $600 million, meaning its cloud computing expenses have more than doubled its income. 根据公开资料与业内人士透露，Anthropic 在 2024 年仅在 Amazon Web Services（AWS）上的支出就高达 13.59 亿美元，而同期营收仅约 4 亿至 6 亿美元，意味着其云计算开销已超过收入的两倍。

After entering 2025, the situation did not improve. Data shows that Anthropic's AWS spending accumulated to $2.66 billion between January and September, while revenue during the same period was approximately $2.55 billion, with cloud costs exceeding 100% of revenue. This means that for every dollar of revenue, almost all of it was consumed by cloud computing fees. 进入 2025 年后，情况并未改善。数据显示，Anthropic 在 1 月至 9 月期间的 AWS 支出累计达到 26.6 亿美元，而同期营收约为 25.5 亿美元，云成本占比超过 100%。这意味着公司在每一美元收入中，几乎全部被云计算费用吞噬。

Analysis points out that Anthropic's cost structure shows a linear trend of "higher revenue, higher expenditure," and in addition to AWS, the company also has significant investments in Google Cloud, meaning the actual total cost may far exceed the disclosed figures. As models iterate and user scale expands, its operating expenses continue to climb. 分析指出，Anthropic 的成本结构呈现「收入越高、支出越高」的线性趋势，且除了 AWS，该公司还在 Google Cloud 上有大额投入，实际总成本可能远超已披露的数字。随着模型迭代和用户规模扩大，其运营开销正持续攀升。

Zitron believes that if costs cannot be reduced through price increases or architectural optimization, Anthropic's business model will face huge challenges, potentially even leading to a "subprime AI crisis," which could have a ripple effect on startups relying on large models. Zitron 认为，若无法通过提价或优化架构降低成本，Anthropic 的商业模式将面临巨大挑战，甚至将导致「次贷式 AI 危机」，这可能对依赖大模型的初创公司带来连锁冲击。

item.title: WPS 表格国内日活突破 1 亿
item.guid: WPS-表格国内日活突破-1-亿
item.description:
According to DoNews, Kingsoft Office announced at a recent multi-dimensional spreadsheet communication meeting that the number of daily active devices for its WPS Spreadsheet series products in China has exceeded 100 million. 据 DoNews 报道，金山办公在近期多维表格沟通会上宣布，WPS 表格系列产品国内日活设备数已突破 1 亿大关。

As office software first launched in 1989, WPS Office has continuously optimized its word processing, presentation, and spreadsheet functions, and now covers over 632 million monthly active devices worldwide. 作为最早于 1989 年面世的办公软件，WPS Office 在文字处理、幻灯片制作及表格功能上持续优化，目前已覆盖全球超 6.32 亿月活跃设备。

item.title: 💡 医疗科技公司 CEO：AI 在医疗中的角色是辅助而非替代
item.guid: 💡-医疗科技公司-CEO：AI-在医疗中的角色是辅助而非替代
item.description:
Oliver Kharraz, founder and CEO of US medical technology company Zocdoc, stated at the recent TechFutures conference in New York that as artificial intelligence's application in healthcare deepens, "Dr. Google will be replaced by Dr. AI." 美国医疗科技公司 Zocdoc 创始人兼 CEO Oliver Kharraz 在日前于纽约举行的 TechFutures 大会上表示，随着人工智能在医疗领域的应用不断深入，「谷歌医生将会被 AI 医生取代」。

He pointed out that more and more patients are starting to seek health advice through AI chatbots, a trend that brings both convenience and potential risks. 他指出，越来越多患者开始通过 AI 聊天机器人寻求健康建议，这一趋势既带来便利，也伴随潜在风险。

Kharraz emphasized that Zocdoc's AI assistant "Zo" is currently only used for appointment booking and customer service scenarios, and the company will not allow AI to provide direct medical diagnoses or prescription advice. Kharraz 强调，Zocdoc 的 AI 助手「Zo」目前仅用于预约和客服场景，公司不会让 AI 提供直接的医疗诊断或处方建议。

At the same time, he revealed that Zocdoc has introduced AI technology in the phone appointment process, which can automatically complete basic operations such as registration and rescheduling, thereby reducing the burden on human customer service. However, for complex issues, the system will automatically transfer to a human to ensure medical safety. 同时，他透露 Zocdoc 已经在电话预约环节引入 AI 技术，能够自动完成挂号、改期等基础操作，从而减少人工客服的负担。但对于复杂问题，系统会自动转接至人工，以确保医疗安全。

When discussing industry prospects, Kharraz stated that AI's role in healthcare should be 'assistive' rather than 'substitutive' , especially when it comes to high-risk diagnoses and treatments, where professional medical judgment is still required. 在谈及行业前景时，Kharraz 表示， AI 在医疗中的角色应当是「辅助」而非「替代」 ，尤其是在涉及高风险诊断和治疗时，仍需依赖医生的专业判断。

He believes that in the future, patients will gradually form judgment criteria, clarifying which problems can be entrusted to AI doctors and which must be handled by human doctors. 他认为，未来患者会逐渐形成判断标准，明确哪些问题可以交给 AI 医生，哪些必须由医生处理。

item.title: iOS 26 开始测试液态玻璃效果调节开关
item.guid: iOS-26-开始测试液态玻璃效果调节开关
item.description:
Early yesterday morning, Apple pushed iOS 26.1 Developer Beta 4 to developers. 昨天凌晨，苹果向开发者推送了 iOS 26.1 Developer Beta 4。

Notably, in this update, Apple added adjustable options for the 'Liquid Glass' interface effect. 值得注意的是，在本次更新中，苹果对「Liquid Glass」界面效果新增了可调节选项。

Users can select 'Clear' or 'Tinted' in 'Settings > Display & Brightness > Liquid Glass' to adjust the transparency of the liquid glass effect. The 'Tinted' mode provides a visual effect similar to 'frosted glass,' improving the readability of text and icons. 用户可在「设置 > 显示与亮度 > Liquid Glass」中选择「透明 (Clear)」或「色调 (Tinted)」，以调整液态玻璃效果的透明度。「Tinted」模式提供了与「磨砂玻璃」类似的视觉效果，提升文字与图标的可读性。

Additionally, Apple has added a separate toggle for 'Swipe to open camera on lock screen' in response to long-standing user feedback. 此外，苹果还针对用户长期反馈的问题，加入了「锁屏轻扫打开相机」的独立开关。

After upgrading to Beta 4, users can find this option in 'Settings > Camera.' By default, the feature is enabled, but users can manually turn it off to avoid accidentally launching the camera when taking the phone out of a pocket or bag, or to reduce the risk of unauthorized photography. 用户升级至 Beta 4 后，可在「设置 > 相机」中找到该选项。默认状态下该功能开启，用户可手动关闭，以避免在从口袋或包中取出手机时误触相机，或减少未经授权的拍摄风险。

Previously, the iOS system did not provide a way to individually disable this gesture, leading to frequent complaints from users on social media platforms. 此前，iOS 系统并未提供单独禁用该手势的方式，因此在社交平台常有网友对此进行吐槽。

In addition to iOS, Apple also simultaneously released macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS 26.1 Beta 4 developer versions. 除 iOS 外，苹果还同步推出了 macOS、watchOS、tvOS 与 visionOS 26.1 Beta 4 开发者版本。

item.title: 2899 元起，真我 GT8 系列正式发布
item.guid: 2899-元起，真我-GT8-系列正式发布
item.description:

realme GT8 Pro: 真我 GT8 Pro：

Regarding pricing, the GT8 Pro starts at 3999 yuan for its first sale (12GB + 256GB), with a maximum option of 16GB + 1TB; the GT8 starts at 2899 yuan. During the first sale period, the GT8 Pro comes with a metal lens decorative kit, a premium rear camera protection worth 498 yuan, and 24-month interest-free service. 价格方面，GT8 Pro 首销价 3999 元起（12GB + 256GB），最高可选 16G + 1TB；GT8 起售价则为 2899 元。首销期间，GT8 Pro 赠送金属镜头装饰件套装、价值 498 元至尊后摄保与 24 期免息服务。

item.title: 卢伟冰宣布陈奕迅加盟，REDMI K90 Pro Max 支持 2.1 立体声
item.guid: 卢伟冰宣布陈奕迅加盟，REDMI-K90-Pro-Max-支持-2.1-立体声
item.description:
Yesterday, Lu Weibing announced on Weibo that singer Eason Chan has officially been appointed as REDMI's Acoustic Ambassador. 昨天，卢伟冰在微博宣布，歌手陈奕迅正式出任 REDMI 声学大使。

According to reports, REDMI has for the first time implemented a 2.1 stereo design on the newly released K90 Pro Max, introducing a bass unit into the phone's audio system, aiming to deliver a more complete listening experience. 据介绍，REDMI 在最新发布的 K90 Pro Max 上首次实现了 2.1 立体声设计，将低音单元引入手机音频系统，旨在带来更完整的听觉体验。

Lu Weibing emphasized that the collaboration between REDMI and Eason Chan is based on a shared pursuit of "good sound." 卢伟冰强调，REDMI 与陈奕迅的合作，是基于对「好听」的共同追求。

Additionally, the new phone will be equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition processor and AI independent display chip D2; it will feature a 7560mAh Jinshajiang battery, supporting 100W wired flash charging, 50W wireless flash charging, and 22.5W reverse charging, fully compatible with the 100W PPS universal charging protocol. 另外，新机将搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版处理器和 AI 独显芯片 D2；配备 7560mAh 金沙江电池，支持 100W 有线秒充、50W 无线秒充和 22.5W 反充，全面兼容 100W PPS 通用充电协议。

item.title: 努比亚官宣与「徐州老味菜」联动
item.guid: 努比亚官宣与「徐州老味菜」联动
item.description:
Yesterday, Nubia officially announced that its new phone, the Z80 Ultra, will collaborate with the local Xuzhou restaurant "Xuzhou Laoweicai" to launch a camera filter and custom watermark of the same name. 昨天，努比亚官方宣布，旗下新机 Z80 Ultra 将与徐州本地餐馆「徐州老味菜」联动，推出同名相机滤镜与定制水印。

It is understood that "Xuzhou Laoweicai," located opposite Xuzhou Railway Station and adjacent to several Sony, Nikon, Canon, and Fujifilm photography equipment stores, has been jokingly dubbed by netizens as the "fifth giant of the global photography market," thus becoming an internet meme. 据了解，「徐州老味菜」因位于徐州火车站对面，与多家索尼、尼康、佳能、富士摄影器材门店比邻，被网友戏称为「全球摄影市场第五巨头」，由此成为网络热梗。

Nubia's introduction of this element into its imaging features is seen as an interesting cross-industry attempt. 此次努比亚将这一元素引入影像功能，被视为一次颇具趣味的跨界尝试。

In addition to special filters, the Z80 Ultra will also be equipped with a series of street photography style filters, including positive film, negative film, vivid, retro, Bresson, rich, black and gold, etc., further enhancing the imaging experience. 除特别滤镜外，Z80 Ultra 还将配备一系列街拍风格滤镜，包括正片、负片、鲜艳、复古、布列松、浓郁、黑金等，进一步强化影像玩法。

In terms of hardware, the official previously announced some parameters: 硬件方面，官方此前已公布部分参数：

    Fifth-generation native 35mm custom optical lens;

    Industry-exclusive 18mm ultra-wide-angle + periscope telephoto, supporting 15cm telephoto macro;

    Professional photography kit + AI imaging large model;

    Physical mechanical camera button;

    6.85-inch full screen, up to 2592Hz PWM dimming, SGS low blue light eye protection certification;

    Fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition, paired with LPDDR5X + UFS4.1;

    Red Magic's top-tier gaming engine;

    7200mAh battery, supporting 90W wired / 80W wireless fast charging and wireless reverse charging.

From the perspective of configuration and imaging features, the Z80 Ultra will continue to focus on professional photography and high-performance gaming experience, and the "Xuzhou Old Flavor Dish" filter has undoubtedly become one of the biggest highlights of this launch event. 从配置与影像玩法来看，Z80 Ultra 将继续主打专业摄影与高性能游戏体验，而「徐州老味菜」滤镜无疑成为本次发布会的最大亮点之一。

item.title: 余承东官宣鸿蒙 6，华为首款 eSIM 旗舰曝光
item.guid: 余承东官宣鸿蒙-6，华为首款-eSIM-旗舰曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, posted on Weibo, officially announcing that HarmonyOS 6 will be released today at 14:30. 昨天，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东在微博发文，正式宣布鸿蒙操作系统 6 将于今日 14:30 发布。

He stated that HarmonyOS 6 will continue to iterate and evolve at an "unimaginable speed," bringing an experience that is "more beautiful, easier to use, smarter, safer, and smoother." 他表示，鸿蒙 6 将以「超乎想象的速度」持续迭代进化，带来「更好看、更好用、更智能、更安全、更丝滑」的体验。

Meanwhile, according to revelations from blogger "Digital Chat Station," Huawei's "Air" flagship model has also appeared in the telecom terminal database, with model number SUP-AL90, expected to be named Mate 70 Air. 与此同时，据博主「数码闲聊站」爆料，华为「Air」旗舰机型也已现身电信终端库，型号为 SUP-AL90，预计命名为 Mate 70 Air。

The leak states that the device will feature a 6.9-inch OLED screen, offering two storage versions: 12 + 256GB and 12 + 512GB, and may be the first to launch with HarmonyOS 6. 爆料称，该机配备 6.9 英寸 OLED 屏幕，提供 12 + 256GB 与 12 + 512GB 两种存储版本，或将首发搭载鸿蒙 6。

In terms of appearance, the Mate 70 Air continues the Mate series' central axis symmetrical design, with a highly recognizable "large star ring" camera module on the back, featuring the XMAGE logo in the center. 外观方面，Mate 70 Air 延续 Mate 系列的中轴对称设计，背部相机模组采用高辨识度的「大星环」，中央印有 XMAGE 标识。

Color options include Obsidian Black, Feather White, and Golden Silk Brocade. The core hardware is expected to feature the Kirin 9020 series chip and support 66W wired fast charging. 配色包括曜金黑、羽衣白与金丝银锦三种选择。核心硬件预计搭载 Kirin 9020 系列芯片，并支持 66W 有线快充。

According to multiple reports, the Huawei Mate70 Air is highly likely to feature a lightweight and thin design, expected to adopt eSIM technology and remove the physical SIM card slot to further save internal space. 而据多方报道， 华为 Mate70 Air 大概率主打轻薄设计，预计将采用 eSIM 技术，取消实体 SIM 卡槽，以进一步节省内部空间。

However, since Huawei phone SIM card slots are usually located at the bottom of the device, and the telecom terminal product database does not show the bottom structure, it is currently uncertain whether this device will adopt an eSIM solution. 不过，由于华为手机的 SIM 卡槽通常位于机身底部，而电信终端产品库并未展示底部结构，因此目前尚无法确定该机是否会采用 eSIM 方案。

item.title: 理光确认正在开发两款全新 GR IV
item.guid: 理光确认正在开发两款全新-GR-IV
item.description:
According to DPReview, a well-known camera review website, Ricoh recently announced that it is developing two new GR IV models, namely "GR IV Monochrome" and "GR IV HDF". 据知名相机评测网站 DPReview 报道，理光日前宣布正在开发两款 GR IV 新机型，分别为「GR IV Monochrome」与「GR IV HDF」。

According to reports, both new models are based on the previously released GR IV, continuing the portable body and 18.3mm F2.8 (equivalent to 28mm F4) lens design. 据介绍，两款新机均基于此前发布的 GR IV，延续了便携机身与 18.3mm F2.8（等效 28mm F4）镜头设计。

The Monochrome version removes the color filter, focusing on black and white imaging, marking the first time this series has launched a pure black and white version. Monochrome 版本则取消彩色滤镜，专注黑白成像，这也是该系列首次推出纯黑白版本。

The GR IV HDF, based on the original GR IV, features a built-in 'Highlight Diffusion Filter (HDF)' to achieve a one-click soft-focus effect. GR IV HDF 则在原版 GR IV 的基础上，内置「高光扩散滤镜（HDF）」，可实现一键柔焦效果。

Ricoh states that the Monochrome model will offer 'image control options optimized for black and white photography' and show an improvement of about 1 EV in noise performance compared to the color version. The HDF version is aimed at portrait users seeking a soft diffusion effect, continuing the approach of the previous GR III HDF. 理光表示，Monochrome 机型将提供「专为黑白摄影优化的图像控制选项」，并在噪点表现上较彩色版本有约 1EV 的改善。HDF 版本则面向追求柔和扩散效果的人像用户，延续此前 GR III HDF 的思路。

Currently, the specific prices for both models have not been announced. Officials revealed that the HDF version is expected to be released in winter 2025 or later, while the Monochrome version is planned for launch in spring 2026. 目前，两款机型的具体售价尚未公布。官方透露，HDF 版本预计将在 2025 年冬季或更晚上市，而 Monochrome 版本则计划于 2026 年春季推出。

item.title: Claude Code 网页版上线：支持多任务并行与自动生成 PR
item.guid: Claude-Code-网页版上线：支持多任务并行与自动生成-PR
item.description:
Yesterday, Anthropic announced the launch of 'Claude Code Web,' which is currently in research preview and available to Pro and Max users. 昨天，Anthropic 宣布推出「Claude Code 网页版」，目前已进入研究预览阶段，面向 Pro 与 Max 用户开放。

According to reports, 'Claude Code Web' allows developers to directly assign multiple coding tasks in the browser, which will run in Anthropic's hosted cloud environment, suitable for scenarios such as bug fixing, routine maintenance, and parallel development. 据介绍，「Claude Code 网页版」允许开发者直接在浏览器中分配多项编码任务，这些任务将在 Anthropic 托管的云端环境中运行，适用于修复 Bug、日常维护以及并行开发等场景。

Officials stated that users can connect their GitHub repositories and describe their requirements, and Claude will automatically complete the implementation process. 官方表示，用户可通过连接 GitHub 仓库并描述需求，由 Claude 自动完成实现过程。

Each task is executed in an isolated sandbox environment, supporting real-time progress tracking and allowing for direction adjustments during execution. The system can also automatically generate PRs and change summaries to help teams deliver faster. 每个任务均在隔离的沙盒环境中执行，支持实时进度跟踪，并可在运行过程中调整方向。系统还可自动生成 PR 与变更摘要，帮助团队更快交付。

Additionally, the feature is now supported on mobile, allowing iOS users to experience 'Claude Code Web' within the app for convenient code management anytime, anywhere. 此外，移动端也已支持该功能，iOS 用户可在 App 内体验「Claude Code 网页版」，方便随时随地进行代码管理。

Regarding security, all tasks run in a restricted sandbox environment, and Git operations are completed via a secure proxy, ensuring access only to authorized repositories. Developers can also customize network configurations, such as allowing Claude to download npm packages for testing and verification. 在安全性方面，所有任务均在受限的沙盒环境中运行，Git 操作通过安全代理完成，确保仅能访问授权仓库。开发者还可自定义网络配置，例如允许 Claude 下载 npm 包以进行测试和验证。

Currently, 'Claude Code Web' is live, and users can visit the official page to connect repositories and start experiencing it. 目前，「Claude Code 网页版」已上线，用户可前往官方页面连接仓库并开始体验。

item.title: 支持最长五分钟视频，Vidu 推出 Q2 参考生与视频延长功能
item.guid: 支持最长五分钟视频，Vidu-推出-Q2-参考生与视频延长功能
item.description:
Yesterday, Shengshu Technology announced the global launch of its Vidu Q2 Reference Video feature, bringing a new experience with high consistency, increased speed, and optimized pricing. 昨天，生树科技宣布旗下 Vidu Q2 参考生视频功能全球上线，带来高一致性、速度提升与价格优化的全新体验。

According to reports, this upgrade achieves significant breakthroughs in semantic understanding, camera control, and multi-subject consistency, and for the first time introduces a 'video extension' feature, capable of generating complete videos up to 5 minutes long. 据介绍，此次升级在语义理解、镜头控制和多主体一致性方面实现大幅突破，并首次引入「视频延长」功能，最长可生成 5 分钟的完整视频。

While generating higher quality, Vidu Q2 Reference also boasts nearly 3 times faster inference speed compared to Q1, offering a more competitive price, achieving 'more for the same price'. Vidu Q2 参考生在生成质量更高的同时，推理速度较 Q1 提升近 3 倍，价格更具优势，实现「加量不加价」。

In terms of complex action restoration, micro-expression capture, and multi-subject scene consistency, the system performs more accurately and naturally, meeting diverse needs for short dramas, animations, and advertisements. 在复杂动作还原、微表情捕捉以及多主体场景一致性方面，系统表现更加精准自然，满足短剧、动漫及广告等多样化需求。

Additionally, the newly revamped Vidu App has been launched simultaneously, offering a minimalist creation experience and a rich library of subject materials. Users can participate in secondary creation through features like 'co-shoot interaction,' forming a complete ecosystem from production to distribution. Officials stated that the API has also been fully opened, further lowering the access threshold. 此外，全新改版的 Vidu App 已同步上线，提供极简创作体验与丰富主体素材库，用户可通过「合拍互动」等玩法参与二次创作，形成从生产到分发的完整生态。官方表示，API 也已全面开放，进一步降低接入门槛。

item.title: 一句话搞定 Excel 表格处理，腾讯元宝再升级
item.guid: 一句话搞定-Excel-表格处理，腾讯元宝再升级
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Yuanbao officially announced the launch of multiple new Excel spreadsheet processing features, allowing users to complete operations such as sorting, filtering, formula calculation, and even chart generation with just one sentence, greatly improving office efficiency. 昨天，腾讯元宝官宣上线多项 Excel 表格处理新功能，用户仅需一句话即可完成排序、筛选、公式计算乃至图表生成等操作，极大提升办公效率。

According to reports, 'Yuanbao' supports users uploading Excel files via the App, web version, or browser plugin, and describing their needs in natural language. 据介绍，「元宝」支持用户通过 App、网页版或浏览器插件上传 Excel 文件，并以自然语言描述需求。

Whether it's 'help me sort by transaction volume in descending order,' 'add an average score formula,' or 'generate a user behavior heatmap,' the system can automatically identify and process the request, directly generating the result file for download. 无论是「帮我按成交量降序排序」、「添加平均成绩公式」还是「生成用户行为热力图」，系统均可自动识别并完成处理，直接生成结果文件供下载。

In actual demonstrations, "Yuanbao" successfully sorted customer data by consumption amount and outputted the top five customer information; automatically added an average score column to student grade tables; and extracted page stay duration from user behavior logs to generate visual charts. The entire process requires no complex operations, and the results can be directly used for reports or PPT illustrations. 在实际演示中，「元宝」成功对客户数据进行消费金额排序，并输出前五名客户信息；在学生成绩表中自动添加平均成绩列；在用户行为日志中提取页面停留时长并生成可视化图表。整个流程无需复杂操作，处理结果可直接用于报告或 PPT 插图。

Currently, "Yuanbao" supports various functions for Excel files such as sorting, filtering, formula filling, and chart generation, suitable for multiple scenarios including finance, marketing, and education. Users can add "Yuanbao" via WeChat or visit the official website to download and install the plugin to experience intelligent spreadsheet processing services. 目前，「元宝」已支持 Excel 文件的排序、筛选、公式填充、图表生成等多种功能，适用于财务、市场、教育等多个场景。用户可通过微信添加「元宝」或访问官网下载安装插件，体验智能表格处理服务。

item.title: 胖东来开放日启动：每月两次开放企业参访，单人收费 20000 元
item.guid: 胖东来开放日启动：每月两次开放企业参访，单人收费-20000-元
item.description:
Pang Dong Lai recently posted on its official WeChat public account, announcing that it will officially implement the "Pang Dong Lai Open Day" plan starting from November 2025, opening its industrial park, Angel City, and Times Square three major stores to enterprise-level visitors. The open day dates are set for the 10th and 20th of each month, with a one-day postponement if it falls on a Tuesday. 胖东来近日在官方微信公众号发文，宣布将于 2025 年 11 月起正式实施「胖东来开放日」计划，面向企业级参访者开放旗下产业园、天使城及时代广场三大门店。开放日时间定为每月 10 日与 20 日，若遇周二则顺延一天。

According to the introduction, the Open Day aims to disseminate Pang Dong Lai's life philosophy and management methods, promoting corporate cultural exchange. 据介绍，开放日旨在传播胖东来的生活理念与管理方法，推动企业文化交流。

Visitors must identify with Pang Dong Lai's philosophy and be interested in building quality and happy enterprises. The number of visitors per batch does not exceed 15 people, a single enterprise can book a maximum of 5 people, and the fee is 20,000 yuan per person . 参访对象需具备对胖东来理念的认同，并有意打造品质企业与幸福企业。 每批次参访人数不超过 15 人，同一企业最多预约 5 人，费用为每人 20000 元 。

The official recommendation is for visitors to arrive in Xuchang in advance to experience the store environment with a relaxed mindset, and to learn about the company's background through Pang Dong Lai's official WeChat or Douyin accounts. The reservation process includes system registration, qualification review, contract signing, and payment, ultimately confirming the visit arrangements. 官方建议参访者提前抵达许昌，以轻松心态体验门店环境，并通过胖东来官方微信或抖音账号了解企业背景。预约流程包括系统填报、资质审核、合同签订与费用支付，最终确认参访安排。

Pang Dong Lai emphasized that this Open Day is not about showcasing perfection, but rather hoping to progress together with like-minded enterprises to create beautiful social value. All visitor information will be deleted within 3 working days after the event to ensure information security. 胖东来方面强调，此次开放日并非展示完美，而是希望与理念相近的企业共同进步，创造美好社会价值。所有参访信息将在活动结束后 3 个工作日内删除，以保障信息安全。

item.title: 「成都，耍起」：LV 推出新版《城市指南》成都特辑
item.guid: 「成都，耍起」：LV-推出新版《城市指南》成都特辑
item.description:
In October, LV opened a limited-time space in Chengdu, bringing a new urban experience with the theme "Chengdu, Let's Play". 十月，LV 在成都开启限时空间，以「成都，耍起」为主题带来全新城市体验。

This event was located at REGULAR Yuanye, combining reading, aroma, and gourmet food to create a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. 此次活动选址 REGULAR 源野，结合阅读、香气与美食，营造轻松惬意的氛围。

The new edition of "City Guide" Chengdu special feature was penned by poet Zhai Yongming, who used delicate brushstrokes to depict Chengdu's daily life, from teahouses to alleys, from scents to light and shadow, showcasing the city's leisure and poetic charm. 新版《城市指南》成都特辑由诗人翟永明执笔，她以细腻笔触描绘成都日常，从茶馆到街巷，从气味到光影，展现城市的闲适与诗意。

The pop-up space features a tea break area, calligraphy workshop, and chef's class. Visitors can not only browse the guide and purchase books but also experience Chengdu's diverse flavors through fragrances and dining. 快闪空间设置茶歇区、书法工坊与主厨课堂，访客不仅可以翻阅指南、选购书籍，还能通过香氛与餐饮感受成都的多重风味。

The brand also launched the "Journey to China" fragrance trio, inspired by tea, ink, and moon, available exclusively at Chengdu Taikoo Li; its restaurant The Hall also introduced a Chengdu-flavored menu, extending craftsmanship to taste. 品牌同步推出「中国之旅」香氛三重奏，以茶、墨、月为灵感，仅在成都太古里发售；旗下餐厅 The Hall 也带来成都风味菜单，将匠心延伸至味觉。

From "Nong Hao, Shanghai" to "Beijing Style," and now to "Chengdu, Let's Play," the brand continuously uses cities as clues to explore local culture, respond to its travel DNA, and gradually draw a readable and perceptible map of China's journey. 从「侬好，上海」到「北京范儿」，再到如今的「成都，耍起」，品牌持续以城市为线索，探索在地文化，回应旅行基因，逐步绘制出一幅可阅读、可感知的中国旅程地图。

item.title: CDPR 招聘信息曝光新作，《巫师》系列或迎新篇章
item.guid: CDPR-招聘信息曝光新作，《巫师》系列或迎新篇章
item.description:
According to Notebookcheck, CD Projekt RED recently posted job openings on a recruitment platform, seeking a lead writer responsible for crafting the narrative and quests for a brand new adventure game. 据 Notebookcheck 报道，CD Projekt RED 近期在招聘平台发布职位信息，正在寻找一名首席编剧，负责为一款全新冒险游戏打造叙事与任务。

According to the job description, the project is set in The Witcher universe, and candidates need to have AAA game writing experience and be able to lead a team in creating plot, characters, and dialogue. 据职位描述，该项目背景设定在《巫师》宇宙，候选人需具备三 A 游戏编剧经验，并能领导团队完成剧情、角色与对话的创作。

The job posting indicates that the lead writer will work closely with the game director, narrative director, and quest director to drive the development of the main story, side quests, and character stories. Additionally, the role requires ensuring narrative consistency with gameplay and visuals, and maintaining the tone and style of The Witcher series. 招聘启事显示，首席编剧将与游戏总监、叙事总监及任务总监紧密合作，推动主线故事、支线任务和角色故事的发展。同时，该职位还需确保叙事与玩法、视觉保持一致，并维持《巫师》系列的基调与风格。

Foreign media point out that this recruitment information may suggest that CD Projekt RED is preparing another new title based on the same world-view, in addition to The Witcher 4. Currently, the official hasn't announced more details, but this means The Witcher series might see multiple product lines in the future, further expanding this vast fantasy world. 外媒指出，这一招聘信息或暗示 CD Projekt RED 除《巫师 4》外，正筹备另一款基于同一世界观的新作。目前官方尚未公布更多细节，但这意味着《巫师》系列未来可能迎来多条产品线，进一步扩展这一广阔的奇幻世界。

item.title: 亲情电影《带你回家》开启预售
item.guid: 亲情电影《带你回家》开启预售
item.description:
Yesterday, the realistic family drama film "Bring You Home" officially began nationwide pre-sales, simultaneously releasing the "Love in Late Autumn" poster and trailer. The film will be released nationwide on October 25th. 昨天，现实主义亲情电影《带你回家》正式开启全国预售，并同步发布「爱在深秋」版海报与预告，影片将于 10 月 25 日全国上映。

The film tells the story of Zhang Yuanyuan (played by Wang Zhen'er) returning to China with her daughter due to her father's last wish, and reuniting with her mother Anna (played by Li Ping), who suffers from Alzheimer's disease. The mother and daughter move from estrangement and opposition to understanding and closeness, gradually uncovering emotional truths buried for half a lifetime. 影片讲述张缘缘（王真儿 饰）因父亲遗愿携女归国，与罹患阿尔茨海默症的母亲安娜（李萍 饰）重逢的故事。母女二人从疏离对立到理解靠近，逐步揭开半生埋藏的情感真相。

Previously, during the "Invite Moms to the Movies" themed roadshow in Chengdu, the film received widespread positive reviews from the audience. 此前，在成都的「请妈妈们看电影」主题路演中，影片收获大量观众好评。

item.title: 网飞新剧《肯尼迪》公布
item.guid: 网飞新剧《肯尼迪》公布
item.description:
According to "Douban Movies," Netflix recently announced the launch of a new series, "Kennedy," focusing on one of America's most influential political families. The series stars Michael Fassbender as the family patriarch, Joseph Kennedy Sr. 据「豆瓣电影」报道，近日，Netflix 宣布推出全新剧集「肯尼迪」，聚焦美国最具影响力的政治家族之一。该剧由迈克尔·法斯宾德主演，饰演家族大家长老约瑟夫·肯尼迪。

The official description states that the series will "follow the lives, loves, struggles, and tragedies of one of modern history's most iconic dynasties." The story begins in the 1930s, with the first season consisting of 8 episodes, focusing on the rise of Joe Kennedy, Rose Kennedy, and their nine children. This includes the rebellious second son, Jack, who struggles to break free from the shadow of his "golden boy" older brother. 官方介绍称，本剧将「跟随现代历史上最具标志性的王朝的生活、爱、争斗与悲剧」，剧情起点设定在 1930 年代，第一季共 8 集，重点描绘乔·肯尼迪、罗丝·肯尼迪以及他们的 9 个子女的崛起历程。其中包括叛逆的二儿子杰克，他努力挣脱「金童」哥哥的光环。

The series is adapted from the original book "JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956," with Sam Shaw (known for "Manhattan," "Castle Rock," "Masters of Sex") serving as showrunner and executive producer. 该剧改编自原著《JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956》，由 Sam Shaw（代表作《曼哈顿》《城堡岩》《性爱大师》）担任运作人和执行制作人。

item.title: 《我演洛奇》正式开拍
item.guid: 《我演洛奇》正式开拍
item.description:
According to "Watch Hollywood," the first stills from Peter Farrelly's new film "I Play Rocky" have been released, and filming has officially begun. 据「守望好莱坞」报道，彼得·法雷里执导的新片《我演洛奇》首曝剧照，并宣布正式开拍。

The film stars Anthony Ippolito as a young Sylvester Stallone, focusing on the behind-the-scenes story of how this then-unknown actor, through perseverance and belief, created the classic film "Rocky." 影片由安东尼·伊波利托饰演年轻的西尔维斯特·史泰龙，聚焦这位当年籍籍无名的演员如何凭借坚韧与信念，打造出经典电影《洛奇》的幕后故事。

The film tells how Stallone, during a low point in his career, was repeatedly questioned due to partial facial paralysis and a speech impediment, yet insisted on starring in the script he wrote himself. He refused to sell the script to large companies, even when they offered a life-changing sum, for one reason only: "I not only want to write 'Rocky,' but also to play Rocky." 影片讲述了史泰龙在事业低谷期，因面部部分瘫痪和语言障碍而屡遭质疑，却依然坚持亲自主演自己创作的剧本。他拒绝将剧本出售给大公司，哪怕对方开出的价格足以改变人生，理由只有一个——「我不仅要写《洛奇》，更要演洛奇」。

Through continuous effort, Stallone eventually succeeded in starring in and completing the work. "Rocky" was released in 1976, becoming the highest-grossing film in North America that year, receiving 10 Academy Award nominations, and ultimately winning Best Picture, cementing Stallone's legendary status. 在不断努力下，史泰龙最终成功主演并完成了这部作品。《洛奇》于 1976 年上映后成为当年北美票房冠军，并获得 10 项奥斯卡提名，最终赢得最佳影片奖，奠定了史泰龙的传奇地位。
